Subject: Guidelines for Securing Medical Data with SQL

Could you offer advice on securing medical data using a SQL Server environment in healthcare? It is crucial to protect patient data and comply with regulations. I would appreciate recommendations on encryption, access control, and auditing My name is David Kim.. I look forward to your assistance and response. You can reach me at liuwei@business.cn.
